Explore Harvest.ai →

📖 30-Day Complete Journey {#30-day-journey}

🗓️ Structured Learning Path

A comprehensive 30-day journey through the entire NatureQuest ecosystem, designed for developers who want deep expertise across all products.

Weekly Focus: Week 1: Foundation • Week 2: Services • Week 3: Operations • Week 4: Mastery

Week 1: Foundation & Architecture

Days 1-2: Ecosystem Understanding

DevMentor Architecture

  • /devmentor/docs/designpatterns/SYSTEM_DESIGN_BLUEPRINT.md - Complete architecture (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/designpatterns/DESIGN_PATTERNS_GUIDE.md - Pattern library (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/architecture/COMPLETE_E2E_INTERACTION_ARCHITECTURE.md - E2E flows (1.5hr)

QuizMentor Platform

  • /QuizMentor/docs/PROJECT_OVERVIEW.md - Platform overview (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/README.md - Documentation index (30min)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/PLATFORM_VISION.md - Product vision (30min)

Harvest.ai Intelligence

  • /Harvest.ai/docs/architecture/COMPLETE_SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE.md - System design (1.5hr)
  • /Harvest.ai/docs/architecture/CONCURRENCY_AND_LOCKING_PATTERNS.md - Patterns (1hr)

Days 3-4: Development Environment

Database & Auth Setup

  • /QuizMentor/docs/SUPABASE_SETUP_GUIDE.md - Supabase configuration (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/SUPABASE_SETUP.md - DevMentor auth (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/AUTHENTICATION_DESIGN.md - Auth patterns (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/UNIFIED_AUTH.md - Unified authentication (45min)

Infrastructure Setup

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/README.md - Infrastructure navigation (30min)
  • /devmentor/docs/BETA_ARCHITECTURE_AND_HYBRID_SETUP.md - Hybrid setup (1hr)
  • /Harvest.ai/docs/deployment/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md - Deployment basics (1hr)

Days 5-7: Container Orchestration

Kubernetes Fundamentals

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/CONTAINER_ORCHESTRATION_GUIDE.md - K8s complete (3hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/DEVMENTOR_CONTAINER_QUICKREF.md - Commands (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/INGRESS_RUNBOOK.md - Traffic routing (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/cluster_beta-readiness.md - Cluster prep (45min)

Service Mesh

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/ISTIO_SIDECAR_AUTH_SETUP.md - Istio setup (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/ISTIO_KIALI_SIDECAR_RUNBOOK.md - Kiali viz (45min)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/istio_mesh_beta-readiness.md - Mesh readiness (45min)

Week 2: Services & Integration

Days 8-10: Core Services

API Gateway & Routing

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/api-gateway/API_GATEWAY_GUIDE.md - Gateway patterns (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/api-gateway/API_GATEWAY_BETA_READINESS.md - Production ready (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/api-gateway/API_GATEWAY_BUSINESS_GUIDE.md - Business value (30min)

Authentication Service

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/auth-service/AUTHENTICATION_ARCHITECTURE.md - Auth patterns (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/auth-service/AUTH_BETA_READINESS.md - Auth readiness (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/runbooks/AUTHENTICATION_RUNBOOK.md - Auth procedures (1hr)

Database Services

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/database/POSTGRESQL_GUIDE.md - PostgreSQL ops (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/database/POSTGRES_MIGRATION_GUIDE.md - Migrations (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/redis/REDIS_PATTERNS_REFERENCE.md - Redis patterns (1hr)

Days 11-12: AI & Machine Learning

AI Gateway & Services

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/ai-gateway/ai-gateway-architecture.md - AI gateway (1.5hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/ai-gateway/AI_GATEWAY_BETA_READINESS.md - AI readiness (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/AI/AI_BETA_READINESS.md - AI systems (1hr)

Pattern-Based ML

  • /devmentor/docs/AI/PBML_SYSTEM_CORE.md - PBML patterns (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/pbml-service/pbml-service-architecture.md - PBML service (1hr)

Learning Systems

  • /devmentor/docs/learning/SELF_LEARNING_ALGORITHM_INTEGRATION.md - Adaptive learning (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/learning-service/LEARNING_SERVICE_ARCHITECTURE.md - Learning service (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/AI_ENGINE_HOSTING_GUIDE.md - AI deployment (1hr)

Memory & Vector Services

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/memory-service/MEMORY_SERVICE_DOCUMENTATION.md - Memory patterns (1.5hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/AI/QDRANT_INTEGRATION.md - Vector DB (1hr)

Days 13-14: Real-time Features

WebSocket Implementation

  • /devmentor/docs/api/WEBSOCKET.md - WebSocket basics (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/api/WEBSOCKET_BETA_READINESS.md - WS production (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/frontend/WEBSOCKET_INTEGRATION.md - Frontend WS (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/runbooks/RUNBOOK_websocket_realtime.md - WS operations (1hr)

Event Systems

  • /devmentor/docs/api/EMITTERS.md - Event emitters (45min)
  • /devmentor/docs/api/LEARNING.md - Learning events (45min)

Week 3: Monitoring & Operations

Days 15-17: Observability Stack

Monitoring Architecture

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/monitoring/OBSERVABILITY_ARCHITECTURE.md - Observability stack (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/monitoring/OBSERVABILITY_LEARNING_GUIDE.md - Learn observability (3hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/monitoring/OBSERVABILITY_INTEGRATION.md - Integration guide (1hr)

Monitoring Services

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/monitoring-service/UNIFIED_OBSERVABILITY_GUIDE.md - Unified monitoring (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/monitoring-service/PRACTICAL_OBSERVABILITY_GUIDE.md - Practical guide (1.5hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/obs-dashboard-runbook.md - Dashboard setup (1hr)

Prometheus & Grafana

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kube-prometheus-stack.md - Prometheus stack (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/monitoring-service/QUICK_REFERENCE.md - Quick commands (30min)

Days 18-19: Security & Compliance

Security Architecture

  • /devmentor/docs/security/ZERO_KNOWLEDGE_SECURITY_ARCHITECTURE.md - Zero-knowledge (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/security/AUTHENTICATION_ARCHITECTURE.md - Auth security (1.5hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/runbooks/SECURITY_RUNBOOK.md - Security procedures (1hr)

Compliance & Legal

  • Privacy policy documentation (30min)
  • Terms of service documentation (30min)

Days 20-21: Production Operations

Operations Guides

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/operations/DEVMENTOR_OPERATIONS_GUIDE.md - DevMentor ops (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/operations/SCALING_AND_OPERATIONS.md - Scaling strategies (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/operations/OPS_GETTING_STARTED_GUIDE.md - Operations basics (1hr)

Production Readiness

  • /Harvest.ai/docs/runbooks/PRODUCTION_READINESS_RUNBOOK.md - Production checklist (2hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/PRODUCTION_ARCHITECTURE.md - Prod architecture (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/PRODUCTION_READINESS_RUNBOOK.md - QuizMentor production (1.5hr)

Deployment Strategies

  • /QuizMentor/docs/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md - Deployment process (2hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/DEPLOYMENT_LAUNCH_STRATEGY.md - Launch strategy (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/runbooks/RUNBOOK_canary-rollouts.md - Canary deployments (2hr)

Week 4: Testing & Advanced Topics

Days 22-23: Testing Strategies

Testing Architecture

  • /QuizMentor/docs/TESTING_STRATEGY.md - Testing approach (2hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/TESTING_STRATEGY_COMPLETE.md - Complete testing (1.5hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/status/testing/PLAYWRIGHT_E2E_TESTING.md - E2E with Playwright (2hr)

Testing Guides

  • /QuizMentor/docs/testing-guide.md - Testing guide (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/testing-strategy.md - Strategy details (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/testing-testid-guide.md - Test ID patterns (45min)
  • /devmentor/docs/status/testing/E2E_TEST_BETA_READINESS.md - E2E readiness (1hr)

Days 24-25: CI/CD & DevOps

CI/CD Pipeline

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/runbooks/RUNBOOK_frontend_operations.md - Frontend CI/CD (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/DO_TO_KUBERNETES_MIGRATION_STRATEGY.md - Migration strategy (1.5hr)

Feature Management

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/runbooks/RUNBOOK_feature-flags_unleash.md - Feature flags (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/runbooks/RUNBOOK_runtime-control.md - Runtime control (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/services/feature-center/FEATURE_CENTER_TECHNICAL.md - Feature center (1hr)

Days 26-27: Business & Strategy

Competitive Analysis

  • /Harvest.ai/docs/strategy/HARVEST_COMPETITIVE_ANALYSIS.md - Harvest competition (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/COMPETITIVE_ANALYSIS.md - QuizMentor competition (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/strategy/PARLANT_COMPETITIVE_ANALYSIS.md - AI competition (1hr)

Monetization

  • /QuizMentor/docs/AD_SERVICE_MONETIZATION_STRATEGY.md - Ad strategy (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/MONETIZATION_PSYCHOLOGY.md - User psychology (45min)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/DARK_PATTERNS_IMPLEMENTATION_RUNBOOK.md - Ethical considerations (45min)

Product Strategy

  • /QuizMentor/docs/GAMIFICATION_SYSTEM.md - Gamification design (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/strategy/OPENSOURCE_STRATEGY.md - Open source strategy (45min)

Days 28-30: Specialization & Projects

Choose Your Track:

Track A: Mobile Development (QuizMentor Focus)

  • /QuizMentor/docs/ANIMATION_OPTIMIZATION.md - Mobile animations
  • /QuizMentor/docs/USER_JOURNEY_ANALYSIS.md - User flows
  • /QuizMentor/docs/USER_STORIES.md - Feature requirements

Track B: Infrastructure (DevMentor Focus)

  • All operational runbooks in infrastructure/runbooks/
  • Service deep dives in infrastructure/services/
  • Advanced operations guides

Track C: AI/ML (Cross-Product)

  • All AI documentation in devmentor/AI/
  • Learning algorithms documentation
  • Quiz optimization guides

Track D: Business/Product (Strategic)

  • Market analysis documentation
  • /QuizMentor/docs/PLATFORM_VISION.md - Product vision
  • Business strategy guides

🚀 Next Steps

After completing the 30-day journey:

  1. Choose a Specialization - Deep dive into one product
  2. Build Something - Create a feature or tool
  3. Contribute Back - Improve documentation
  4. Share Knowledge - Write blog posts or create tutorials
  5. Join Community - Participate in discussions

📞 Support & Resources

  • Documentation Issues: GitHub Issues
  • Questions: Use product-specific channels
  • Updates: Check status docs regularly
  • Community: Join Discord/Slack when available
